citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1200pm on
09-Jan-18.
Contacted licensee by phone and he stated that he had cattle out and was preoccupied with returning them to their
pastures.
Additional Inspectors
Steneroden Katie, Veterinary Medical Officer

narrative:
